propAlt:
Used in combination with `src` or `srcSet` to
provide an alt attribute for the rendered `img` element.
propChildren:
Used to render icon or text elements inside the Avatar if `src` is not set.
This can be an element, or just a string.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propComponent:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propImgProps:
Attributes applied to the `img` element if the component is used to display an image.
It can be used to listen for the loading error event.
propSrcSet:
The `srcSet` attribute for the `img` element.
Use this attribute for responsive image display.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesColorDefault: Styles applied to the root element if not `src` or `srcSet`.
stylesCircular: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="circular"`.
stylesRounded: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="rounded"`.
stylesSquare: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="square"`.
stylesImg: Styles applied to the img element if either `src` or `srcSet` is defined.
stylesFallback: Styles applied to the fallback icon
